bssearchadmin-desc: Provides a management interface of the search
apihelp-bs-extendedsearch-stats-descript: Returns statistical data about the registered backends and their configured sources
apihelp-bs-extendedsearch-stats-summary: Returns statistical data about the registered backends and their configured sources
apihelp-bs-extendedsearch-stats-param-st: A list of statistics that should be returned
apihelp-bs-extendedsearch-triggerupdate-: Title of the page the update should be triggered
apihelp-bs-extendedsearch-generic-param-: Key of the configured backend that should be queried
One or more sources within the specified backend separated by pipe. If empty, all available sources will be queried.
bs-extendedsearch-admin-label-all-docume: Total number of documents in index
